ygData.subject: patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t get me wrong...I am thrilled this has been fixed.  But didn t Gordon recently say something like: There are no broken quests, only pre-set stories for
ygData.messageBody:
Don't get me wrong...I am thrilled this has been
fixed. But didn't Gordon recently say something like:


"There are no broken quests, only pre-set stories for
future expansion"?

*Quest Fixes*

- Fixed the "Minotaur Horns" Quest
***snip***
- Fixed the "Travis Twostring" quest.
- The Fleshy Orb quest and "Fabian" should
really be fixed now. These were not correct after
the last patch due to a data export issue.
